original_text: The bad woman that you saw is a picture of the great city. That city has power over all the kings who rule on the earth.’
korean_text: 또 네가 본 그 여자는 땅의 왕들을 다스리는 큰 성이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: The bad woman that you saw
is a picture of the great city
That city has power over all the kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시는 모든 왕들에게 권세가 있다
